content: **this is beautiful textured crochet cowl that uses a 2x2 basketweave stitch pattern ** **size** adult - 11x7 flat unblocked adjustable by following notes within the pattern **skill level** intermediate skills and techniques used include - working in the round counting stitches working foundation stitches working front and back post stitches following repeats **yarn** 150 yards #4 worsted weight yarn knit picks preciosa tonal worsted 100% merino wool **hook size** us size i/9 5 5mm crochet hook **other** read through all of the pattern notes before beginning and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet *this pattern has been tested to ensure accuracy * copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
